events.title: NoCo Hackers
events.description: NoCo Hackers is a budding community of cybersecurity professionals, enthusiasts, and playful computing practitioners based in Northern Colorado. Our mission is to share knowledge, foster collaboration, and create a supportive environment for all skill levels to learn and grow in the ever-evolving world of cybersecurity.
events.location: Purpose Brewing & Cellars, Fort Collins, CO
